participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Lucas enjoys trying new things and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: i love chocolate bars. i play the violin and the guitar. i speak chinese. my father is an electrician. i play ping pong.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, Ella loves to explore and create stories with her toys.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i don't pick up my toys. i'm four.

content.text: Hey! Do you play ping pong?
